lead_paragraph: A kitchen worker died after apparently being trapped in a walk-in freezer about 13 hours in an Atlanta hotel, the police said.

headline.print_headline: Georgia: Worker Found Dead in Freezer
headline.main: Georgia: Worker Found Dead in Hotel Freezer

snippet: A kitchen worker died after apparently being trapped in a walk-in freezer about 13 hours in an Atlanta hotel, the police said.
abstract: Kitchen employee, whose name is not released, is discovered dead in walk-in freezer of Westin Peachtree Plaza in Atlanta after apparently being trapped there for 13 hours.
